Class UserService

java.lang.Object
com.github.ilim.backend.service.UserService
@Service public class UserService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing user-related operations.

Provides functionalities such as retrieving users, promoting/demoting roles, blocking users, and updating user profiles.

See Also:

      public UserService()

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      public List<User> getAll()
      Retrieves all users sorted by their creation date in descending order.
      Returns:
      a list of all User entities

    • findById

      public User findById(String userId)
      Finds a user by their unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      userId - the unique identifier of the user
      Returns:
      the User entity corresponding to the provided ID
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if no user is found with the given ID

    • findByIdAsAdmin

      public User findByIdAsAdmin(@NonNull User admin, String userId)
      Finds a user by their unique identifier as an admin.
      Parameters:
      admin - the User entity representing the admin
      userId - the unique identifier of the user to find
      Returns:
      the User entity corresponding to the provided ID
      Throws:
      UserIsNotAdminException - if the requesting user is not an admin
      UserNotFoundException - if no user is found with the given ID

    • create

      public User create(@NonNull User user)
      Creates a new user and saves it to the repository.
      Parameters:
      user - the User entity to create
      Returns:
      the created User entity

    • promoteToInstructor

      public void promoteToInstructor(InstructorApp application)
      Promotes a user to an instructor based on the provided InstructorApp.

      Updates the user's profile image URL, bio, title, and role to UserRole.INSTRUCTOR.

      Parameters:
      application - the InstructorApp containing promotion details

    • demoteToStudent

      public void demoteToStudent(User user)
      Demotes a user from an instructor to a student.
      Parameters:
      user - the User entity to demote
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - if the user is not currently an instructor

    • updateFromDto

      public void updateFromDto(@NonNull User user, @NonNull UpdateUserDto dto)
      Updates a user's profile based on the provided UpdateUserDto.
      Parameters:
      user - the User entity to update
      dto - the data transfer object containing updated profile details
      Throws:
      CantUpdateBlockedUserException - if the user is blocked and cannot be updated

    • isUserBlockedByEmail

      public boolean isUserBlockedByEmail(String email)
      Checks if a user is blocked based on their email address.
      Parameters:
      email - the email address of the user
      Returns:
      true if the user is blocked, false otherwise

    • blockUser

      public void blockUser(User user)
      Blocks a user, preventing them from performing certain actions.
      Parameters:
      user - the User entity to block
      Throws:
      UserIsAlreadyBlockedException - if the user is already blocked

    • findByRole

      public List<User> findByRole(UserRole role)
      Finds users by their role.
      Parameters:
      role - the UserRole to filter users by
      Returns:
      a list of User entities matching the specified role
